```{r include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(magrittr)
library(tableHTML)

```
```{r}
dist <- eval(parse(text=paste(params$Namex)))
dist2 <- eval(parse(text=paste(params$Namey)))

```

```{r include=FALSE}

datos=params$datos

```



```{r echo=FALSE}

x=datos%>% select(dist)
y=datos%>% select(dist2)

    plot(x=x,y=y,main="Plot of data player",xlab=Namex,ylab=input$select3,col = "#00AFBB")
```
